title: The Princess Who Defied Kings
description: Betrayed by justice, what would you do? Princess Naji of the White Kingdom is no pampered princess, but when her wedding night with the Red Knight leads to a terrible crime, her world is shattered and she is banished to a place ruled by a man known to be mad and cruel. With pluck and courage Naji is determined to survive, and the people she meets on the way might just make the difference.
author: J. Kirsch
